title: os.RemoveAll failing on OS X Yosemite
body:
by **educability**: 
What does 'go version' print?
go version default darwin/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
1. Create a tmp directory with ioutil.TempDir
2. Try to remove the tmp directory with os.RemoveAll

What happened?
RemoveAll("/var/folders/m5/b2r2nsln51g4gvblmkzp75rr0000gn/T/go-vcs-git089777413")
failed: readdirent: invalid argument

What should have happened instead?
The directory should have been removed without an error occurring.
